issue.title: NCCs cause strange MPI crashes after commit 4232435 in 3D domains with distributed processor meshes

content.raw:
Yeah, I get this error with a stack built on hdf5 1.10\+ \(default apt-get hdf5 from the install script in ubuntu on my local PC, and Ben’s cluster\_install that our group uses on pleiades both use these newer versions\). When I install dedalus on hdf5 1.8.13 \(on local PC and pleiades\), it…still fails, unfortunately, and it does so in essentially the same way. Since the problems seem to be happening in mpi4py, I also tried reverting that back to 2.0.0 and 3.0.0, but neither one runs \(with hdf5 1.8\).

Can you send me the versions of all the stuff that your stack works with on Flatiron? I want to see if I can essentially build the same stack as you have and if my simple- and complex- NCC problems work there.
